nodes.text: The Old Galactic Market Concourse Staging Point was located in the Old Galactic Market on Coruscant between the Shipping and Receiving Docks and the Concourse section. The Migrant Merchants' Guild had taken over most of the Galactic Market except for the Concourse area during the Coruscant riots in 3653 BBY. However, in 3643 BBY, the Coruscant Security Force assembled in the Concourse Staging Point to launch an attack to push out the guild from the Galactic Market.
